name: html-architecture-from-codebase
prompt: Create an architecture diagram for this project
expected_behaviors: Asks or confirms output format (HTML, Mermaid, or DOT)
Analyzes codebase to identify real components before drawing
Produces a diagram with semantic color coding
For HTML: includes at least Business Context, Data Flow, and System Architecture sections

name: mermaid-architecture
prompt: Generate a Mermaid architecture diagram showing the service dependencies
expected_behaviors: Uses graph TD or graph LR with subgraphs for grouping
Edge labels describe what flows between services

name: dot-graphviz
prompt: Create a Graphviz DOT diagram of our system architecture
expected_behaviors: Saves a .dot file with the system name in the filename
Uses subgraph cluster_ blocks for logical groupings
Includes rendering commands in a comment header
Semantic fill colors applied to all nodes

name: c4-context-diagram
prompt: Create a C4 context diagram showing our system and its external dependencies
expected_behaviors: Includes Person, System, System_Ext, and Rel declarations
Shows users and external systems at the correct boundary level

name: no-placeholder-data
prompt: Draw an architecture diagram of our authentication service
expected_behaviors: Does not invent components that are not present in the codebase
Asks clarifying questions if the system is not clear from available files
